item.description:
On 1 June 1845 a homing pigeon arrived in London after a nearly 6000 mile journey from Namibia in 55 days. He was probably hoping to meet with Dickens for some writing tips.

You only need to travel to Davis Square, and we'll have fun with some writing exercises.

If the weather is good, we'll be meeting outside, in front of JP Licks, across from the Somerville Theatre. If not, we'll probably be in Blue Shirt. Let's hope that Mother Nature cooperates this week.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for people with writing implements and paper.
item.name: Writing Exercises that aren't far away
